description.@en: You are able to transform the mind of a madman into a sane one, much like how a rod of iron is struck into a sword.

effect.@en: After successfully casting this spell, the person you touch permanently reduces their Chaos Ranks equal to your [WB].

criticalSuccess.@en: As above, but you also cure a single Disorder (if the person has one).

criticalFailure.@en: Your touch warps the mind of the patient, driving them deeper into madness. They immediately gain Corruption equal to your [WB].
